Package gaffer.operation.simple.hdfs.handler.mapper

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MapperGenerator<KEY_IN,VALUE_IN>
    A MapperGenerator is used by the Hadoop job Mapper to convert the input key and value to an Iterable of Elements
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractAddElementsFromHdfsMapper<KEY_IN,VALUE_IN,KEY_OUT,VALUE_OUT>
    An AbstractAddElementsFromHdfsMapper is a Mapper that uses a MapperGenerator to map the input data into Elements and then delegates the elements to an abstract map method to serialise them and add them to the job map context.
    AvroMapperGenerator<OBJ>
    An AvroMapperGenerator is an MapperGenerator that can handle Avro input data and convert it into an Iterable of Elements.
    TextMapperGenerator
    An TextMapperGenerator is an MapperGenerator that can handle text input data and convert it into an Iterable of Elements.
